text: Carlos Garc√≠a Romero (25 June 1940 - 30 December 2013), better known by his stage name Tito Mora, was a Spanish pop singer. Mora was born in Madrid. He began his career in the 1950s as a singer for Los Brujos, one of Spain's first pop music groups. He recorded his final album in 1996. Tito Mora died from a long pulmonary illness on 30 December 2013, aged 72, at a hospital in Madrid. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Musicians from Madrid Category:Spanish singers Category:Deaths from respiratory failure
title: Tito Mora
